Routes.GET /api: Serves an HTML page with documentation for all the available endpoints
Routes.GET /api/topics/:topic_id/articles: Return all the articles for a certain topic
Routes.POST /api/topics/:topic_id/articles: Add a new article to a topic.
Routes.GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Get all the comments for a individual article
Routes.POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Add a new comment to an article.
Routes.PUT /api/articles/:article_id: Increment or Decrement the votes of an article by one. This route requires a vote query of 'up' or 'down' e.g: /api/articles/:article_id?vote=up
Routes.PUT /api/comments/:comment_id: Increment or Decrement the votes of a comment by one. This route requires a vote query of 'up' or 'down' e.g: /api/comments/:comment_id?vote=down
Routes.GET /api/users/:username: Returns the profile data for the specified user
